Key to the families of Dicotyledons
Key to the genera of Scrophulariaceae

source.author: Barker, W.R.
source.title: Scrophulariaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Barker, W.R. (1999). Scrophulariaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves more or less filiform with lamina undifferentiated or lamina oblanceolate and 1–3 mm wide with base long-attenuate; calyx with a red-purple patch below each sinus; pedicels in fruit usually 8–25 mm long
Leaves with lamina more or less oblong-elliptic, 2–10 mm wide, with base cuneate to rounded; calyx lacking purple patches; pedicels in fruit 0.2–8 mm long
